title: How many times do you think I should have to explain this?
body:
I'm playing Shaco, and ask for a leash. I explain as soon as I ask for a leash on blue that I'm going to box Gromp, then get blue leashed, clearing two camps at once. 

"ur shaco
u dont need leash"

I explain again.

"so u dont need leash"

I explain yet *again*

"but ur shaco"
